trait.name: Gunslinger
entries: Being within 5 feet of a hostile creature or attacking at long range doesn't impose disadvantage on the doragon's ranged attack rolls with a gun. In addition, the doragon ignores half cover and three-quarters cover when making ranged attacks.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The doragon obliteration has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The doragon obliteration's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The doragon makes two Antimatter rifle attacks and cast spell.

action.name: Antimatter rifle
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} to hit, range 120/360 ft., one target. {@h}38 ({@damage 6d10 + 5}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Hex Antimatter rifle
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} to hit, range 120/360 ft., one target. {@h}38 ({@damage 6d10 + 5 + 1d6}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Eldritch Blast
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 120/120 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) force damage.

Firearms aren't widely available in the North, but some members of Bregan D'aerthe are equipped with Lantanese pistols, bullets, and packets of smokepowder. These drow gunslingers are expert pistoleers, as skilled with their guns as the best archers are with their bows.
